## Question 1
```{r}
library(bnlearn)
data("asia")
structure = hc(asia, restart = 3) #start = initial structure, restart = random restarts, score = score, equvivilent sample size.

b=T
for (i in 1:10) {
  structure2 = hc(asia, restart = 1)
  b = all.equal(structure, structure2)
  if (b!=TRUE) {
    break
  } 
}
plot(structure)
plot(structure2)

```
